featured.text: And 38 , Grants Pass has a lot of places to eat, ranging from a low-calorie dessert place to lovely restaurants, some of which o f f e r g o o d f o o d a n d g o r g e o u s v i e w s . 39 you can see, Grants Pass offers a lot to do in the summer.
34 those who prefer to stay in town, Grants Pass offers several nice hotels.

definition.en_def: Funds given by an organization, especially a government, for a specific purpose.
definition.example: The university received several grants to support its research programs.
